record.title: NEW CENTURY FARM PROGRAMS
record.narrative:
NEW CENTURY FARM PROGRAMS -- (Senate - December 18, 2007)

[Page: S15895]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I certify that neither I nor any of my family members have a pecuniary interest in the New Century Farm Programs for which I requested congressionally directed spending via floor action on Harkin amendment No. 3500, a substitute to H.R. 2419.
